title: Ep - 170 - BEHIND THE SCENES OF AMERICA’S GOT TALENT
description:
Executive Producers Sam Donnelly and Jason Raff discuss behind the scenes of America’s Got Talent including the audition process, casting the right judges and host, and how each show is produced. America’s Got Talent airs on Tuesdays at 8:00 on NBC. 


Comedians Julie Goldman and Brandy Howard from Dumb Gay Politics podcast review the season premiere of Big Brother, CBS network’s annual summer hit show. 


Reality Life with Kate Casey 

http://www.loveandknuckles.com
